m_szDocTitle: Does anyone think racquet technology has actually improved in the last 15 or so years? : tennis
m_szDocSumamry: Does anyone think racquet technology has actually improved in the last 15 or so years? : tennis  789Does anyone think racquet technology has actually improved in the last 15 or so years? (self.tennis)submitted 10 days ago by RemioliI almost never see posts here about anything besides the pro tour, so if there is a better place to post this, please let me know. Anyways, I've always thought in basically every sport, the equipment doesn't really go through any significant changes besides the major ones. I don't think a Head intelligence was any "worse" than a Head Flexpoint or Graphene XT. I've b
